reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater chic and well-made, appreciating its soft, wonderful feeling material and comfortable, cozy fit that's not too tight for movement.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You might need a smaller size since they are quite roomy and definitely oversized.
items.body: I normally would wear a medium, but I found that a small size was more appropriate. I usually wear petite tops and this one was long enough and the material is soft and comfortable. I now have two of them and the colors are vibrant and beautiful. Read more
items.author: Speakeasylady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Top!
items.body: Beautiful, slightly oversized shirt that has a nice weight and is soft to the touch. Very stylish with jeans! The color was a little more cream/tan than I expected, but it goes so well with everything so I will keep it. Read more
items.author: NlyS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: I like this casual sweater/top. It has a boxy fit, is comfortable, and roomy. In fact, I could probably have ordered a size down. Read more
items.author: Sally

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pleasantly surprised by this topâ€”after washing it!
items.body: I won't lie: my immediate reaction when I opened the bag was to return it because it looked like an oversized wrinkled, shiny mess on the thin size. But it had no label, and I decided to wash it and hope for the best. I'm so NOT sorry I did. It came out perfectly soft, wrinkle free and looking exactly like the pictures. What looked like flaws were not. It's not too big at all; perfect and true to size. And after wearing it (layered with a collar shirt), I'm surprised at how warm it actually is! It's very flattering, versatile (dress it up or down) and works great with layering. No regrets, so I'm back for more colors! Read more
items.author: Elle M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this and thank me later!!!
items.body: The best quality material Iâ€™ve ever bought from Amazon. Mock neckline and longer cropped style which is perfect for short people. Soft not itchy cheap material, color is perfect red not orange tones, light weight so you can wear a coat over it. . Not hot like wool. Warm but wide sleeves so might wear with something underneath. I have worn with jeans and a skirt. Washes well. I laid flat to dry. It did not ball up like a lot of the stuff Iâ€™ve bought on Amazon. Looks like new after several washes. I would get this in every color. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality but sent back
items.body: I could tell after only wearing for an hour that it would be pilling. Didnâ€™t take a chance and had to send back. The fit and length are good though. Read more
items.author: SVE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ZDC Womenâ€™s Oversized Summer Sweater â€“ 3/4 Sleeve, Casual, Lightweight Knit ðŸ’–
items.body: Love this sweater! ðŸ’• The colors are vibrant and beautiful, and the quality is excellent ðŸŒŸ. However, keep in mind it runs very large, so I recommend ordering your regular size or even one or two sizes down for the perfect fit ðŸ‘š. I bought it on sale and it was totally worth it â€” Iâ€™m already planning to get it in more colors! ðŸŒˆâœ¨ Read more
items.author: Leandra Gomez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute top ..... but
items.body: I love the style ... oversized and cropped. The knit fabric is nice, not too heavy and doesn't cling. HOWEVER, the sweater is shrink wrapped so tight the creases are embedded in the sweater. I took a wet towel and put it in with my sweater on a delicate cycle in the dryer to get creases out. Several creases came out, but not all, so I had to steam iron to get all the creases out. That worked and the sweater is very cute, but it took a lot of effort. I want to order another color but not sure I want to go thru that hassle again. Read more
items.author: Rhonda T Fisher

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Grey, Fuchsia, Bright Orange, Army Green, Black, Heart Pink, Coffee, Orange, Beige, Light Pink, 01-khaki, Blackish Green, Purplish Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
